text: Je loka allahace smarana ubhe rahuna, basalelya avastheta ani apalya kusivara pahudale asatana karatata ani akasancya va jaminicya nirmitivara vicara-cintana karatata (ani mhanatata) ki he amacya palanakartya! Tu he sarva hetuvina banavile nahi. Tu pavitra ahe. Tevha tu amhala agicya azaba (siksa-yatane) pasuna vacava
